creditline: Gift of Christopher Monkhouse in honor of Nicole and Todd Gibbs
description: ovoid cup with rounded bottom; slightly convex walls; square saucer with concave top decorated with off-center square, on a rounded base; green glaze
dimension: H.3-1/4 x W.4-3/4 x D.4-3/4 in. (overall)
markings: \'A\', stamped into clay, on side of cup at seam; \'AE[connected]\', stamped into clay, on bottom of saucer
title: Palm Cup and Pillow Saucer
